about_the_game:
As the "The Ring" created by the ancient gods was destroyed, the boundary between the real world and the abyss has gradually disappeared. The darkness from the abyss constantly corrupts everything, and the world is on the brink of destruction.

The power of "The Ring" has scattered around the world and fallen upon a few people, giving them very special abilities. They can resist the corruption of the abyss's darkness and travel back and forth between the world and the abyss. These people are called "Ringash." And their destiny is to eliminate all invading abyssal material and repair the rift between the world and the abyss.

Unique Combat Mechanism

The combat mechanism in "Ringash" combines fun and depth. The synchronous system and rating system provide more strategic options for the game, enhancing the playability and depth of the game.

Diverse Combat Styles

The free 3D operation and flexible combo system, combined with the various weapons and moves provided in the game, make combat more than just fighting. Whether on the ground or in the air, it becomes a stage for players to showcase their personal style.

Interesting Exploration Elements

There are many hidden elements in the game that players can explore and discover, such as shortcuts, hidden treasures, extra storys or levels. These exploration elements not only help players better understand the game's story background but also bring more additional fun.

Fascinating storyline

With a fantasy epic storyline and multiple ending designs. Players can discover more hidden storys in the adventure, save the world and explore the truth behind all disasters.

short_description: Ringash is a challenging, fast-paced action game. You can use various weapons and skills to create your own unique combat style to conquer any difficulties. As a warrior with mystical powers, You'll try to save a world that is being destroyed by the abyss, and uncover the truth behind the disaster.
